WHEN "000000" => DATAOUT<="11010010001111110110000000";        --取指
WHEN "000001" => DATAOUT<="10001010001011111100000000";        --IN1
WHEN "000010" => DATAOUT<="10001010001111111000000000";        --MOV
WHEN "000011" => DATAOUT<="10100000001111111100010001";        --LAD
WHEN "000100" => DATAOUT<="10001110000111111100000000";        --ADD
WHEN "000101" => DATAOUT<="10001110100111111100000000";        --INC
WHEN "000110" => DATAOUT<="10001110110111111100000000";        --DEC
WHEN "000111" => DATAOUT<="10000010001111111101000000";        --JNZ
WHEN "001000" => DATAOUT<="10100010001111111000010010";        --STO
WHEN "001001" => DATAOUT<="01000010001111111000000000";        --JMP
WHEN "001010" => DATAOUT<="10000000001101111100000000";        --OUT1
WHEN "001011" => DATAOUT<="10100011100111111100010011";        --STOI
WHEN "001100" => DATAOUT<="10001111110111111100000000";        --SqrtAdd
WHEN "001101" => DATAOUT<="10001111000111111100000000";        --TEST80
WHEN "010001" => DATAOUT<="10001010001111001100000000";        --
WHEN "010010" => DATAOUT<="10000000001110011100000000";        --
WHEN "010011" => DATAOUT<="10000000001110011100000000";        --
WHEN "100000" => DATAOUT<="01000010001111111000000000";        --JNZ转跳
